/home/lucas/apps/compilers/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/23.1/comm_libs/hpcx/hpcx-2.13/ompi/bin/mpif90 -fPIC -cpp -lstdc++ -D_USE_NVTX -lnvToolsExt -cuda -Minfo=accel -gpu=cc86,managed,lineinfo -cuda -acc -fast -shared -Wl,-soname,libgpuGeometry.so -o libgpuGeometry.so CMakeFiles/gpuGeometry.dir/mod_geometry.F90.o  -Wl,-rpath,/home/lucas/Documents/testLinkLibraryNVHPC/build/src/gpuMathOps:/home/lucas/Documents/testLinkLibraryNVHPC/build/src/mpiUtils: ../gpuMathOps/libgpuMathOps.so ../mpiUtils/libmpiUtils.so
